name: GHOST ZERO Alpha v.0.1
description:
wasd - move

space- dash

Lshift- the ship turns white and can absorb bullets, adding to its health, as long as at least 1 energy is available

Lclick- the ship turns blue and shoots blue bullets that hurt blue enemies

Rclick- the ship turns red and shoots red bullets that hurt red enemies

This game is still very far from being finished, and many more features are to come. If you want to stay up to date on the game,  then please follow my itch.io account. If you have any questions, comments, or critisisms post them here or on my twitter @loosejuice1075
